summary: An Ordinance transferring the sum of Two Hundred Seven and 85/100 (207.85) Dollars, from Local Improvement District No. 1467 Fund, into the General Fund of the City of Seattle, for the purpose of reimbursing said General Fund for the deficiency in the Fixed Estimate of said district, for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue, by grading the same, as provided for by Ordinance No. 15788, creating Local Improvement District No. 1467.
